about_intro_1: I’m a Frontend Developer focused on building modern and responsive interfaces using React.js and Tailwind CSS.
about_intro_2: I enjoy working on challenging projects and I’m always eager to learn new technologies. I have experience working both remotely and on-site.
about_intro_3: I specialize in state management tools like Zustand and React Query, and I have a passion for clean UI/UX design with tools like Figma and Shadcn.
